Description.Text: Hotel Saint Jacques is a charming 3-star property offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Paris. Highlights include a lounge bar, free Wi-Fi and an excellent location close to the Pantheon. The 5th arrondissement is notable for its vibrant Latin Quarter and is home to a number of prestigious universities, colleges and schools. Nearby places of interest include the Pantheon, the legendary Shakespeare and Company bookstore and the historic remains of a Roman amphitheatre and thermae. Maubert - Mutualite metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Paris destinations. The hotel is housed in a traditional mid-rise building with wrought iron faux balconies. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are elegantly decorated in a traditional style. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen TV, safe and an en-suite bathroom. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the lounge bar, which features a collection of 18th and 19th-century books, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception. Please note the property is entirely non-smoking.
